body: Duties/Responsibilities The position involves taking/making calls in French and English, writing emails and informing the customers according to the data in the system.As a Dispatch Center Operator, your task will be:- to handle our clients' calls in an effective and pleasant way, with complete professionalism, with courtesy and accuracy, meeting service quality standards;- to receive, register and process customer’s requests and complaints in accordance with the specific working instructions.Skills/QualificationsExcellent French language, both speaking and writingExcellent English language, both speaking and writingVery good communication skills, multi-tasking ability, results-oriented;Customer oriented;Team player;Flexibility, reliability, dedication;Ready for learning new things and bringing an own contribution to the team.
title: Dispatch Center Operator(with French)
locations: Central Business Park Calea Serban Voda nr. 133, București, Municipiul București, România
